sqlMap.select: SELECT storyid as id, name as name, bookid as bookid FROM ltbdb_stories ORDER BY storyid ASC
SELECT storyid as id, name as name, bookid as bookid FROM ltbdb_stories WHERE storyid = #storyid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ltbdb_stories ( name, bookid ) VALUES ( #name#, #bookid# )
sqlMap.update: update ltbdb_stories set name = #name#, bookid = #bookid# where storyid = #storyid#
